alert.note: Alert for Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued July 24 at 6:45PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...A High Surf Advisory remains in effect... * SURF...Surfs of 12 to 14 feet will imapct south and east facing shores of all islands due to a large southerly swell. * TIMING...through Wednesday * IMPACTS...Moderate. Expect strong breaking waves, shore break, and strong longshore and rip currents making swimming difficult and dangerous. Some coastal erosion is also possible. Larger set waves may occasionally impact harbor entrances. Fautuaga mo galu maualuluga Ofisa o le tau Pago Pago AS 645 AFIAFI ASO SA IULAI 24 2022 ...O loo faaauau le Fautuaga mo Galu Maualuluga... * GALU...O galu e 12 i le 14 futu le maualuluga o le a aafia ai talafatai i saute ma sasa`e o motu uma ona o auma tetele mai saute. * TAIMI...seia oo i le Aso Lulu * NOFOAGA AAFIA...Tulaga feoloolo. O le a malolosi le fafati o galu ma`aave o le sami, e le saogalemu ai ona auau. E ono vaaia sologa i gataifale.O nisi o taimi, e iai taimi e maualuluga atu galu nai le maualuga sa fuafuaina, e ono faafaigata ai ona folau vaa laiti i uafu. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... Faamolemole, ia faautagia nei fautuaga mo lau saogalemu.
info.instruction: Beachgoers, swimmers, and surfers should heed all advice given by ocean safety officials and exercise caution.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
